rules_text:
Ward {2} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)[/i]
At the beginning of combat on your turn, for each creature you control, put your choice of a trample counter, a vigilance counter, a reach counter, or a +1/+1 counter on that creature if it doesn’t have a counter of that kind on it.
